sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './General.css'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import * as actions from '../../../actions/account'; import _ from 'lodash' function General(props) { const currentUser = props.currentUser return (
General Account Settings
Private informations
Name:
{_.isEqual(currentUser.providers, []) ? currentUser.profile.name : currentUser.providers[0].name }
Gender:
{currentUser.profile.sex}
Birthday:
{currentUser.profile.date_of_birth}
Email:
{_.isEqual(currentUser.providers, []) ? currentUser.email : currentUser.providers[0].email }
Phone:
{currentUser.profile.phone_number}
Address:
{currentUser.profile.address}
Staff information
Staff ID:
{currentUser.code}
Position:
{currentUser.position}
ID Card:
{currentUser.id_card}
Contract Type:
{currentUser.contract_type !== null ? currentUser.contract_type : <>Updating ...}
Join Date:
{currentUser.joining_date}
Official Date:
{currentUser.official_date !== null ? currentUser.official_date : <>Updating ...}
); } const mapStatetoProps = (state) => { return { currentUser: state.currentUser } } const mapDispatchToProps = (dispatch) => { return { getInfoCurrentUser: () => { dispatch(actions.getInfoCurrentUser()) } } } export default connect(mapStatetoProps, mapDispatchToProps)(General);
